PHRASE.LANG: This gun rack is where Valor operatives keep their tools of the trade. Notice the organised fashion to how they store their firearms. I dare you to touch one without asking. [#Legal]
C'est sur ce râtelier que les agents de Valor stockent leur matériel. Remarquez avec quel soin ils rangent leurs armes. Essayez un peu d'en toucher une sans demander la permission. [#Legal]

In diesem Waffenregal bewahren die Valor-Soldaten ihr Arbeitswerkzeug auf. Beachten Sie, wie geordnet sie ihre Waffen lagern. Es kann übrigens ziemlich ungesund sein, ungefragt eine anzufassen. [#Legal]
Questo porta-armi è usato dai soldati della Valor per riporre la loro attrezzatura. È organizzato alla perfezione e nessuno oserebbe toccarlo senza chiedere il permesso. [#Legal]
En este estante es donde los soldados de Valor guardan sus armas. Mira qué organizadas las tienen. Atrévete a tocar una sin preguntar. [#Legal]
ベイラーの銃架は分かりやすく整理されている。整理整頓はベイラーの基本だ。 [#Legal]
Valor의 병사들이 총기를 보관하는 곳입니다. 진정한 군인들답게 통일된 방법으로 진열되어 있습니다. 함부로 손을 댄다면 어떻게 될까요? [#Legal]
This gun rack is where Valor operatives keep their tools of the trade. Notice the organized fashion they store their firearms. I dare you to touch one without asking. [#Legal]
這款槍架是Valor工作人員安放所需工具之處。請注意他們存放的軍火多麼有系統。你有膽不問一下就碰這些工具嗎？ [#Legal]
這款槍架是Valor工作人員安放所需工具之處。請注意他們存放的軍火多麼有系統。你有膽不問一下就碰這些工具嗎？ [#Legal]
This gun rack is where Valor operatives keep their tools of the trade. Notice the organized fashion in which they store their firearms. I dare you to touch one without asking. [#Legal]
